alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of DeWitt, southern Gonzales and southwestern Lavaca Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hochheim to Fordtran. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cuero, Yoakum, Shiner, Smiley, Thomaston, Ezzell, Hochheim, Cheapside, Westhoff, Koerth, Edgar, Terryville, Sample, Glaze City, Sweet Home, Dreyer, Arneckville, Hamon, Mount Olive and Concrete. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
